docs.snippet: The Moore-McCormack Lines has announced its most ambitious cruise program since its South America passenger service was established in 1938 -- a series of five thirty-eight-day summer cruises through the Caribbean and the South Atlantic to Buenos...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Moore-McCormack Lines has announced its most ambitious cruise program since its South America passenger service was established in 1938 -- a series of five thirty-eight-day summer cruises through the Caribbean and the South Atlantic to Buenos Aires.

headline.main: 5-CRUISE SERIES SET TO SOUTH AMERICA; Moore-McCormack Turns Over Biggest Program to 'Dean' of Passenger Chiefs

docs.snippet: Pound sterling was hit hard again last week. British needs to cover oil payments here brought out offerings considerably in excess of the market's ability to absorb, resulting in a break to $2.78 3/16, a new low. Thursday's final was $2.78 5/8, a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pound sterling was hit hard again last week. British needs to cover oil payments here brought out offerings considerably in excess of the market's ability to absorb, resulting in a break to $2.78 3/16, a new low. Thursday's final was $2.78 5/8, a loss of 1 1/16, cents from the previous week.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended May 29, 1952

docs.snippet: THE first American to win the first prize in a great international musical competition, is 24-year-old Leon Fleisher of San Francisco, "Premier Laureat" of the Queen Elisabeth of Belgium International Musical Competition of 1952, which is today the...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE first American to win the first prize in a great international musical competition, is 24-year-old Leon Fleisher of San Francisco, "Premier Laureat" of the Queen Elisabeth of Belgium International Musical Competition of 1952, which is today the most important and admirably conducted musical contest in the world.
docs.abstract: Queen Elizabeth Internatl Musical Competition, Brussels; O Downes comment

headline.main: COMPETITION AT BRUSSELS; Leon Fleisher, American Pianist, Is Winner of First Prize In International Contest Sponsored by Queen

docs.snippet: LONDON, June 12 (AP) -- The world wool textile industry suffered its first serious post-war recession during 1951, the International Wool Textile Conference was told today.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 12 (AP) -- The world wool textile industry suffered its first serious post-war recession during 1951, the International Wool Textile Conference was told today.
docs.abstract: Internatl Textile Orgn repts use dropped 4 million lbs, '51; textile indus suffered 1st post-war recession; wool output, '51-52, put at 2.29 billion lbs

headline.main: RECESSION SHOWN IN WOOL TEXTILES; First Serious Post-War Drop in 1951 Cut Consumption to 2,248,000,000 Lbs.

docs.snippet: British sterling was severely affected last week by many pressure factors, which included poor British dollar reserves, Prime Minister Churchill's "alarm," low credits in the European Payments Union, and continued rumors of broadening of official...
docs.lead_paragraph: British sterling was severely affected last week by many pressure factors, which included poor British dollar reserves, Prime Minister Churchill's "alarm," low credits in the European Payments Union, and continued rumors of broadening of official trading limits and more convertibility leeway for various types of sterling.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, June 16 -- A repetition of shooting into Brazilian territory by Argentine police has brought to Congress a request that a commission of inquiry be appointed to investigate the situation before the incidents create a critical situation...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, June 16 -- A repetition of shooting into Brazilian territory by Argentine police has brought to Congress a request that a commission of inquiry be appointed to investigate the situation before the incidents create a critical situation between Argentina and Brazil.
docs.abstract: 120 Deputies want border shootings probed; cite smuggling as cause; hold Argentine Govt not directly responsible and seek to avoid diplomatic break

docs.snippet: Fifteen young women, entrants in the "Miss Universe" beauty contest at Long Beach, Calif., starting next Monday, presented gifts from their native lands to Mrs. Vincent R. Impellitteri at Gracie Mansion yesterday, but a 5-week-old female lion stole...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fifteen young women, entrants in the "Miss Universe" beauty contest at Long Beach, Calif., starting next Monday, presented gifts from their native lands to Mrs. Vincent R. Impellitteri at Gracie Mansion yesterday, but a 5-week-old female lion stole the show at the Mayor's official residence.

headline.main: A GIFT FROM AFRICA FOR MRS. IMPELLITTERI

docs.snippet: Effectiveness of recent Brazilian measures to restrict imports in the interest of holding down dollar, obligations was reflected in a decline in the value of new drafts drawn on Brazilian importers during May to $26,100,000 from the April level of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Effectiveness of recent Brazilian measures to restrict imports in the interest of holding down dollar, obligations was reflected in a decline in the value of new drafts drawn on Brazilian importers during May to $26,100,000 from the April level of $35,300.000, according to the latest report by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

headline.main: NEW MAY DRAFTS ON BRAZIL LOWER; Decline to $26,100,000 Level Noted From $35,300,000 in Dollar Obligations

docs.snippet: Passenger travel between New York and the east coast of South America is heavier than at any time in the last twenty-five years. Discussing the unprecedented movement yesterday, the two major ocean carriers in this run admitted that bookings for the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Passenger travel between New York and the east coast of South America is heavier than at any time in the last twenty-five years. Discussing the unprecedented movement yesterday, the two major ocean carriers in this run admitted that bookings for the next two months have already passed their most optimistic expectations.
docs.abstract: Moore-McCormack and Argentine State Line rept NY-S Amer passenger travel at 25-yr high; cite lack of space on Eur-bound ships and ad campaign
